title: @RiotRepertoir  regarding Cassiopeia's rework
body: I wanna thank the follow up you are doing on her. I know that we, the cass mains, have a fame to be quite difficult to please, but it only takes some real interest for me to be satisfied... I would like to add an idea, let the current miasma apply a poison that stays for 2 or 3 seconds on the target even if the target is no longer there... of course with the grounding effect on it, that way it would make it a bit fair and rewarding if you hit it (since it is fixed range), the enemies can just take one step out of the poison currently and they are able to use their mobility again, and there it goes the 22 seconds cd "super cool ability" It really just feels lackluster. One more thing, I saw you on a video testing her and I gotta say, you are hot {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

replies.body:
e girl ???? 
the miasma sucks yes , it needs to go over wall .
being blocked by terrain retires all the potential play making of this spell ; the current cassio can do a lot of thing with her miasma .
Alright this is a suggestion that I can agree with and makes sense. +1
